linkModule.name: 4 in 1 Sheet
linkModule.description: Just a sheet made of European 4 in 1s! Just specify what size you want because otherwise I will choose at random
linkModule.emailBody:
Hello! I'm [NAME HERE]! 
I'm emailing to order a [LENGTH] by [WIDTH] 4 in 1 Sheet!
